title: Burundi Exports
description: Exports in Burundi increased to 27373.92 BIF Million in August from 13935.35 BIF Million in July of 2022. Exports in Burundi averaged 13080.72 BIF Million from 2000 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 108889.68 BIF Million in November of 2021 and a record low of 1013.40 BIF Million in July of 2001. Burundi main exports are coffee (69 percent of total exports) and tea (26 percent) followed by cotton and skins. Main export partners are Switzerland (26 percent of total exports) and Pakistan (11 percent). Others include: Belgium, United Kingdom, Rwanda, Uganda and Egypt. This page provides - Burundi Exports - actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: Bank of Burundi
